mapper.select: select 'hi' as stu_cd, '3' as grade, '박건영' as name, '인문대학' as col_name, '국문학과' as major_name, '950123' as birthday, '010-7777-8888' as phone, 'abc123@naver.com' as email, '재학' as aca_state_cd from dual
select 'prof' as prof_cd, '인문대학' as col_name, '영어영문학과' as major_name, '김교수' as name, '920111' as birthday, '010-5555-6666' as phone, 'pppp@gmail.com' as email, '일반교수' as prof_posi_cd from dual
